title: Add Amazon referral link for hair/skin care product

requirements.summary: Wire the generated product thumbnail image into the BoardCard component so the new Amazon referral link displays correctly in the portfolio showcase
acceptanceCriteria: The generated image is saved to frontend/public/assets/generated
The image filename follows the pattern used for other referral link thumbnails
The BoardCard component correctly displays the generated thumbnail for this referral link

file_operations.description: Verify that the Portfolio component correctly renders the BoardCard with the generated thumbnail at frontend/public/assets/generated/amazon-product.dim_400x300.png when the backend returns the new referral link entry with thumbnailPath set to '/assets/generated/amazon-product.dim_400x300.png'. Ensure the existing useReferralLinks hook and BoardCard mapping logic handle the new entry without modification.
